selected_quotes: New:Speaking Sociologically w/ Big Data:Symphonic Social Science Future for Big Data Research S Halford M Savage
Symphonic social science the future of big data analytics: my new paper with Mike Savage@MikeSav47032563 #websci17 htt…
Want to know about Big Data and its effects on the Social Science research. Here is an article published in @sociology…
Speaking Sociologically with Big Data - Susan Halford, Mike Savage, 2017
